extendedInfo.description: Custom online deals monitoring app.Using keywords that you set, Filtr Deals will "filter" deal sites for your keywords, making it easier to find articles you are interested in reading.There is a "pro" version available with additional options and no ads.Features:* Filter online deals using keywords* Automatic updates and alerts* View/add recent and popular keywords* Tablet optimized layout* Lightweight (~600KB installed)* Move to SD* Assign sites per keyword* Set keywords to exclude* Save articles* No adding and maintaining RSS feeds.* Control the sites you want to monitor* Shake to filter* Read articles offline (pro version)

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: Great!  Except after latest update... doesn\'t work.  Ha ha
reviews.author: A Google User
